verses.verse: Yahweh,<WH3068> I have called<WH7121> on you.<WH2363> Come to me quickly! Listen<WH238> to my voice<WH6963> when I call to you.<WH7121>
Let my prayer<WH8605> be set<WH3559> before<WH6440> you like incense;<WH7004> the lifting up<WH4864> of my hands<WH3709> like the evening<WH6153> sacrifice.<WH4503>
Set<WH7896> a watch,<WH8108> Yahweh,<WH3068> before my mouth.<WH6310> Keep<WH5341> the door<WH1817> of my lips.<WH8193>

Don't<WH5186> incline my heart<WH3820> to any evil<WH7451> thing,<WH1697> to practice deeds<WH5949> of wickedness<WH7562> with men<WH376> who work<WH5949> iniquity.<WH205> Don't<WH3898> let me eat of their delicacies.<WH4516>

Let the righteous<WH6662> strike<WH1986> me,<WH2617> it is kindness; let him reprove<WH3198> me,<WH8081> it is like oil on the head;<WH7218> don't<WH7218> let my head refuse<WH5106> it;<WH8605> Yet my prayer is always against evil deeds.<WH7451>
Their judges<WH8199> are thrown<WH8058> down by the sides<WH3027> of the rock.<WH5553> They will hear<WH8085> my words,<WH561> for they are well spoken.<WH5276>
"As when one plows<WH6398> and breaks<WH1234> up the earth,<WH776> our bones<WH6106> are scattered<WH6340> at the mouth<WH6310> of Sheol.<WH7585>"
For my eyes<WH5869> are on you,<WH136> Yahweh, the Lord.<WH136> In you,<WH2620> I take refuge. Don't<WH6168> leave my soul<WH5315> destitute.<WH6168>
Keep<WH8104> me from the snare<WH3027> which they have laid<WH3369> for me,<WH4170> from the traps of the workers<WH6466> of iniquity.<WH205>
Let the wicked<WH7563> fall<WH5307> together into their own nets,<WH4364> while<WH3162> I pass by.<WH5674>
